original_text: But when they urged him till he was ashamed, he said, “Send.” They sent therefore fifty men. And for three days they sought him but did not find him.
korean_text: 무리가 그로 부끄러워하도록 강청하매 보내라 한지라 그들이 오십 명을 보냈더니 사흘 동안을 찾되 발견하지 못하고

sentences.original_text: But when they urged him till he was ashamed

sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들이 사람 오십 명을 보내니

sentences.original_text: And for three days they sought him
